About Me

My name is Chloe and I'm looking to improve my knowledge in software development and devops.
My programming journey kickstarted learning to make a simple HTML website on Microsoft Notepad.
I'm currently enrolled in the The Odin Project's full stack JavaScript curriculum and have coded various projects to showcase my work.
